appName.description: The title of the application, displayed in the web store.

appDesc.message: Record content of pages to an animated gif picture from browser
appDesc.description: The description of the application, displayed in the web store.

mouseTip.message: Move the mouse and Click#or Drag#to select area

overLaunch.message: You can overwrite the hotkeys for launching this extension
overLaunch.description: options页面 设置启动插件快捷键的描述

maxFrameRateDesc.message: Specify the max FPS while recording

defaultFPSDesc.message: Use this as the FPS value when automatically generating GIF images. This should be less than or equal to the Max Frame Rate

defaultQualityDesc.message: Use this as the QUALITY value when automatically generating GIF images

usageDataDesc.message: We will use anonymous usage data to optimize Capture to a Gif, If you don't want us to collect usage data, please turn this switch on

startOrFinishDesc.message: Start or finish recording content for creating gif image

capturePngImgDesc.message: Capture selected content as a PNG image

defaultSearchEngine.description: 设置默认搜索引擎说明的label

defaultSearchEngineDesc.message: This extension takes over your default search settings and changes it to Bing or Google that depends on your location.
defaultSearchEngineDesc.description: 设置默认搜索引擎的说明

donateDesc.message: Help developers optimize this extension through donations
